name: Appota
tag_list: appota, vietnam, hanoi, mobile-application, mobile-developer, appstore, app-store, delivery-mobile-content, disruptive
overview:
Appota is a dynamic & innovative company in ICT industry in Vietnam. Company serves mobile developers, content providers, advertisers and smartphone users in Vietnam. Appota cooperates with thousand of developers in Vietnam to distribute their application/game. In 2012, Appota was named as “Most Disruptive” from over 565 start-up worldwide by Founder Institute (http://fi.co/posts/646)

Appota headquartered in Hanoi, Vietnam. For more information please visit: http://www.appota.com and http://www.facebook.com/appota.vietnam

offices.address1: 4F, LE Building - No 11, Alley 71, Lang Ha st., Ba Dinh Dist.
